item.title: [GROOVY-5756] error during class generation: cannot define closures inside methods of an enum instance
item.description:
The following code fails to run:

enum MyEnum {
    INSTANCE {
        String foo() {
            def clos = {
                "foo"
            }
            clos.call()
        }
    }

    String foo() {
    }
}

assert "foo" == MyEnum.INSTANCE.foo()

The Groovy runtime throws the following exception when trying to execute it:
